name: Bennett
title: Trial by Fire
description: A good-natured adventurer from Mondstadt who's unfortunately extremely unlucky.

charged.1: Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash 2 rapid sword strikes.

plunging.1: Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

description.0: Bennett puts all his fire and passion for adventuring into his sword. Results may vary based on how fired up he is...
description.3: A single, swift flame strike that deals <pyro>Pyro DMG</pyro>.
description.6: Charges up, resulting in different effects when unleashed based on the Charge Level.
7: Level 1: Strikes twice, dealing <pyro>Pyro DMG</pyro> and launching opponents.
Level 2: Unleashes 3 consecutive attacks that deal impressive <pyro>Pyro DMG</pyro>, but the last attack triggers an explosion that launches both Bennett and the enemy.
description.8: Bennett takes no damage from being launched.
description.10: An attack that combines Bennett's dreams and passion with Pyro. But passion is sometimes overblown, and Pyro sometimes blows over.

description.0: Bennett performs a jumping attack that deals <pyro>Pyro DMG</pyro>, creating an Inspiration Field.
3: If the health of a character within the AoE is equal to or falls below 70%, their health will continuously regenerate. The amount of HP restored scales off Bennett's Max HP.
If the health of a character within the AoE is higher than 70%, they gain an ATK Bonus that is based on Bennett's Base ATK.
Imbues characters within the AoE with <pyro>Pyro</pyro>.
description.5: Benny's Adventure Team's adventures are always fraught with unexpected danger. However, Bennett is more inclined to call them "journeys full of wonder, excitement, and beauty."

description.0: Within the area created by Fantastic Voyage, Passion Overload takes on the following effects:
1: Bennett will not be launched by the effects of Charge Level 2.

description.0: When dispatched on an expedition in Mondstadt, time consumed is reduced by 25%.
Fantastic Voyage's ATK increase no longer has an HP restriction, and gains an additional 20% of Bennett's Base ATK.
When Bennett's HP falls below 70%, his Energy Recharge is increased by 30%.
Increases the Level of Passion Overload by 3.
Using a Normal Attack as the second attack of Passion Overload's Charge Level 1 will perform a follow-up attack.
description.1: This additional attack does 135% of the second attack's DMG.

description.0: Increases the Level of Fantastic Voyage by 3.
Sword, Claymore, or Polearm-wielding characters inside Fantastic Voyage's radius gain a 15% Pyro DMG Bonus and their weapons are infused with Pyro.
